items.title: Child dies and another in hospital after house fire
items.description: One child has died at the scene of the "intense" house fire in Hamstreet, Kent Fire & Rescue says.

items.title: Kyrgios defeats Sabalenka - but what did 'Battle of the Sexes' achieve?
items.description: Aryna Sabalenka loses to Nick Kyrgios in a Battle of the Sexes-style match that lacked the intensity and entertainment promised in the build-up.

items.title: Kyrgios defeats Sabalenka - but what did 'Battle of the Sexes' achieve?
items.description: Aryna Sabalenka loses to Nick Kyrgios in a Battle of the Sexes-style match that lacked the intensity and entertainment promised in the build-up.

items.title: Gray heads Spurs to victory at Crystal Palace
items.description: Nineteen-year-old Archie Gray scores his first senior goal for Tottenham Hotspur to beat Crystal Palace 1-0.

items.title: 'Watkins has the edge - but Calvert-Lewin could yet make World Cup'
items.description: Dominic Calvert-Lewin is the top English scorer in the Premier League this season - can he force his way back into the national squad five years after...
